Actions.Name: Holy
Actions.Effect: Foes inside are branded. Branded foes must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Redempta
Actions.Description: Target defeated ally in range 4 and return them to the battlefield with 50% hp. They can act normally starting next round.

Actions.Name: Shield of Faith
Actions.Description: Allied character in range 3 becomes marked, and gains sturdy and resistance while marked.
